response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map<String, Object>> it = list.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
    Map<String, Object> map = it.next();
    try {
        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(map);
        System.err.println(json.toString(2));
    } catch (JSONException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: The issue with the code is that you are trying to convert a List of Maps to a JSONObject. Instead, you should be converting each Map to a JSONObject. Also, you are not using the value of the iterator in the loop.
